snippet: The police interviewed more people in the killing of a groom whose body was found hours after the Kentucky Derby.
abstract: Police in Louisville, Ky, interview people in the killing of groom Adan Fabian Perez, whose body was found at the Churchill Downs racetrack hours after the conclusion of the Kentucky Derby; no suspects are named.
lead_paragraph: The police interviewed more people in the killing of a groom whose body was found hours after the Kentucky Derby.

headline.main: Few Clues in Killing of Groom at Churchill Downs
headline.print_headline: Few Clues in Killing of Groom at Churchill Downs
